text: And fortune, on his damned quarrel smiling, Show'd like a rebel's whore: but all's too weak: For brave Nomacs - well he deserves that name Disdaining fortune, with his brandish'd steel, Which smoked with bloody execution, Like valour's minion carved out his passage. Till he faced the slave; Avd fortune;on his dlamned quard smilingj Show'd Gke a rbel's whorebvr aus -b wrat: For hlave Nomas~weu he deserves that name- DiSdaining forune, with ns iolardi<h'd seei Which Smotct with hioody execcetion, lue vaicy's minion cerved ov+ hi< passagej Till h< faceh the slave;
